Sections.Text: The walls of Bosch Manor tremble at the Golem's roar as power from beyond this world fills the construct with terrible power.
'Alive! Alive!', the unnatural thing cries out. 'Beware, I AM ALIVE!'
Tyree and his comrades lie dead at the creatures clay feet, mute testament to the futility of standing in its way.
But this new, faux-life comes at a price. The source of this wondrous power now has a taste for life as well, and it wants to devour more of it.
And the Golem is just another rift in time and space, another doorway for its dark tendrils to reach into our world.
Change is coming to Bosch Manor - the Tyree corpse, made animate and servile, and the Tyree fortune put to a new, darker purpose.
